Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 7th overall pick, by Northeastern in 1981...
Injured on 8/2/1981 with a Jammed Finger, out for one week...
Had first career hit (triple) on 5/19/1982, off Lawrence Chambers (Mal)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/6/1984, off Allen Nunnery (MAN)...
Signed as a free agent by Penn on 2/22/1991 to a 3-year deal worth $1,000,000 per year...
Drove in 7 runs against Lynchburg on 6/3/1993...
